content:
University of Tennessees Ewing Gallery presents its new exhibit Mary Beth Edelson Rescripting The Story  through Dec PERIOD  PERIOD

Edelson deals with feminism throughout her work PERIOD Recently she has been experimenting with interactive media and the representation of women in film PERIOD

 Calvin Chappelle exhibit proprietor said PERIOD

Edelson is no stranger to Ewing as her pieces have been showcased there three times PERIOD

 Chappelle said PERIOD

The internationallyrecognized artist uses a variety of mediums throughout her pieces so the exhibit is broadbased featuring drawings photographs and film among other things Cindy Spangler collections manager said PERIOD

 Spangler said PERIOD

Though the pieces focus on a theme the interpretation is open Chappelle said PERIOD

 he said PERIOD 

The span of time the material deals with allows an interesting retrospection he said PERIOD

An artists lecture and reception will be held on Nov PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD in  Art  Architecture building PERIOD The event is open to the public PERIOD

Admission to the gallery is free PERIOD For more information call  PERIOD
